newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan stocks end lower on tightening liquidity.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan stocks end lower on tightening liquidity.

text.p: Taiwan share prices closed sharply lower on Tuesday as tightening liquidity in the banking system threw caution into the stock market following its recent bull charge, brokers said.
The weighted index opened lower and sank throughout the session before closing 146.08 points or 1.45 percent down at 9,919.68 -- only slightly above the intra-day low of 9,914.10.
Turnover was relatively modest at T$189 billion.
Taiwan's overnight interbank rate soared to 7.499 percent on Monday against Saturday's 6.277 finish.
